resources.string: The Stanley Park Forest in Vancouver BC
A forest walk through stanley park. Great for PTSD - avoid all the city life clunks.

As the green grass, tinted with the twilight shades of purples and yellows, swayed gently to the breeze the translucent clouds moved past the setting sun. Over the bumps of hills, it was just visible. The sun colouring the sky shades of yellow, orange purple looked peaceful against the original shades of light blue
